Quote.Author: Lukas Forchhammer
Quote.QuoteValue: I never watched any award show

Quote.Author: Lukas Forchhammer
Quote.QuoteValue: The neighborhood where I live has little canals, and there are a lot of houseboats there

Quote.Author: Lukas Forchhammer
Quote.QuoteValue: Seeing my child born is so much more important than anything else I've got going on

Quote.Author: Lukas Forchhammer
Quote.QuoteValue: I always saw law as a performance, just like being on a stage

Quote.Author: Lukas Forchhammer
Quote.QuoteValue: If I moved to L.A., I wouldn't move to a ghetto neighborhood. I'd move to some posh, fancy place

Quote.Author: Luke Bryan
Quote.QuoteValue: That's gotta be the one remaining constant - jeans have gotta be tight, baby

Quote.Author: Luke Bryan
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always enjoyed things going at a nice pace, nothing too fast, nothing too crazy

Quote.Author: Luke Bryan
Quote.QuoteValue: Probably fishing is my first passion

Quote.Author: Luke Bryan
Quote.QuoteValue: It's pretty cool to see how far music can take you

Quote.Author: Luke Bryan
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Tailgate Blues' is kind of a lyrical masterpiece of a country song

Quote.Author: Luke Bryan
Quote.QuoteValue: Life's up and down from the time you get here to the time you leave

Quote.Author: Luke Bryan
Quote.QuoteValue: Our crew guys, it's amazing what they have to go through to make a show happen every night

Quote.Author: Luke Bryan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big sports fan in general

Quote.Author: Luke Bryan
Quote.QuoteValue: You always have to work to become a better singer, songwriter and performer

Quote.Author: Luke Bryan
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the attraction to country music is the fans, the lure of the hardcore fan base

Quote.Author: Luke Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a 'Twilight' boy; I'll never be as good looking as those lads, and that's fair enough

Quote.Author: Luke Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: Good suits don't come from anywhere, though - I mainly wear Armani, Louis Vuitton and Burberry

Quote.Author: Luke Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: I come from south Wales. A place called Aberbargoed

Quote.Author: Luke Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: The fascination for the Great Train Robbery has never diminished

Quote.Author: Luke Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: You never get over an ex, but you learn to live with it

Quote.Author: Luke Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: Voices are always a challenge. I always have to work at each accent I do

Quote.Author: Luke Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: A longbow takes a massive draw for the arrow to go anywhere

Quote.Author: Luke Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: I always find cardio the most monotonous. Running on a treadmill shows me why hamsters are so crazy

Quote.Author: Luke Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: I think sandals should be burnt. I hate them - purge them!

Quote.Author: Luke Evans
Quote.QuoteValue: I always wanted to sing, as a child

Quote.Author: Lupita Nyong'o
Quote.QuoteValue: In the madness, you have to find calm

Quote.Author: Lupita Nyong'o
Quote.QuoteValue: There's always a sense of newness with acting, because every role, you come to every role fresh

Quote.Author: Lupita Nyong'o
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a crybaby

Quote.Author: Lupita Nyong'o
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was younger, I was almost too afraid to admit that I wanted to be an actor

Quote.Author: Lupita Nyong'o
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a very ostrich mentality. I feel like I have my head in the sand so no one can see me

Quote.Author: Lupita Nyong'o
Quote.QuoteValue: What's becoming very obvious to me is that fashion is art

Quote.Author: Lupita Nyong'o
Quote.QuoteValue: We, as human beings, have the capacity for extreme cruelty

Quote.Author: Lupita Nyong'o
Quote.QuoteValue: Personally, I don't ever want to depend on makeup to feel beautiful

Quote.Author: Lupita Nyong'o
Quote.QuoteValue: As actors, you become an expert at starting over

Quote.Author: Lupita Nyong'o
Quote.QuoteValue: I thrive on structure. I find my freedom in structure

Quote.Author: Luther Allison
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be in some big beautiful place that nobody want me, because I play the blues

Quote.Author: Luther Allison
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been waiting for that bright sunshine to show up and shine in my back door someday

Quote.Author: Luther Allison
Quote.QuoteValue: But my big thing was always the blues

Quote.Author: Luther Allison
Quote.QuoteValue: In the blues, it just takes so long for us to get recognized

Quote.Author: Luther Allison
Quote.QuoteValue: In the States, it takes you a lifetime just to get from Chicago's South Side to the West Side

Quote.Author: Luther Allison
Quote.QuoteValue: Before I left, I opened a lot of doors for a lot of people to play the blues

Quote.Author: Luther Allison
Quote.QuoteValue: So I cut out all the drinkin' and hangin' out and stuff like that early on

Quote.Author: Luther Allison
Quote.QuoteValue: And I can do the rock clubs if I have to

Quote.Author: Luther Allison
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, I first started going to Europe in the late '70s

Quote.Author: Luther Allison
Quote.QuoteValue: But you know, I still had a dream of being able to go back home and tour

Quote.Author: Lydia Millet
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a lot of contradictions of mermaids as a symbol. I'm always interested in contradictions

Quote.Author: Lydia Millet
Quote.QuoteValue: It seems to me that the time for subtlety in our American life has passed

Quote.Author: Lydia Millet
Quote.QuoteValue: Shouldn't the cascades of extinction and rapid planetary warming register in our literature?

Quote.Author: Lydia Millet
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't tend to picture my characters as actors and actresses

Quote.Author: Lydia Millet
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been interested in obsessive, insane people

Quote.Author: Lydia Millet
Quote.QuoteValue: I love irony

Quote.Author: Lydia Millet
Quote.QuoteValue: Work-wise, I try not to repeat myself too often. And I have to love whatever I'm doing

Quote.Author: Lydia Millet
Quote.QuoteValue: If I can't find a way to love it, I let it go. Kind of the opposite of the popular homily

Quote.Author: Lydia Millet
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Dept. of Speculation' contains numerous enviable lines

Quote.Author: Lydia Millet
Quote.QuoteValue: You need not fear my extinction. Fear my proliferation! I've already reproduced!

Quote.Author: Lykke Li
Quote.QuoteValue: I was 21 and homeless - such a broken, lost woman

Quote.Author: Lykke Li
Quote.QuoteValue: I felt such a deep connection with dolphins. I felt like they were the only ones who understood me

Quote.Author: Lykke Li
Quote.QuoteValue: It's the ultimate task to do something stripped back, so you're not hiding behind anything

Quote.Author: Lykke Li
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not so interested in being indie just for the sake of being indie

Quote.Author: Lykke Li
Quote.QuoteValue: I will grab any opportunity I can to learn something new

Quote.Author: Lykke Li
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm actually a really shy person. I just really enjoy being in studio; I don't go out much

Quote.Author: Lykke Li
Quote.QuoteValue: I lived five years in Portugal and then spent winters in Nepal or India

Quote.Author: Lykke Li
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm from Sweden, so I don't enjoy winter at all; there's nothing cute about it

Quote.Author: Lykke Li
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes when I write songs, I don't know what they're about, and it just suddenly comes to me

Quote.Author: Lykke Li
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll always be in some type of turmoil. So what I've tried to do is just surrender to that

Quote.Author: Lyle Lovett
Quote.QuoteValue: It's important to be successful enough to be able to keep doing what you love

Quote.Author: Lyle Lovett
Quote.QuoteValue: You're saying something with your appearance whether you mean to or not, so you may as well mean to

Quote.Author: Lyle Lovett
Quote.QuoteValue: Fortunately, I've never had a job

Quote.Author: Lyle Lovett
Quote.QuoteValue: Singing your own songs is all about individual expression

Quote.Author: Lyle Lovett
Quote.QuoteValue: I am limited by what I can think of to do-my choices are not so great

Quote.Author: Lyle Lovett
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always thought that writing isn't really that hard. It's having a good idea that's hard

Quote.Author: Lyle Lovett
Quote.QuoteValue: Horses teach you patience and how to do things the right way so you can get the right result

Quote.Author: Lyle Lovett
Quote.QuoteValue: I've gotten to work with some wonderful directors and people who have been great teachers to me

Quote.Author: Lyle Lovett
Quote.QuoteValue: I played guitar when I was young and never really considered it as a way to make a living

Quote.Author: Lyle Lovett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really in no danger of being perceived as a famous movie actor!

Quote.Author: Lynn Good
Quote.QuoteValue: Leadership is a journey - you never arrive

Quote.Author: Lynn Good
Quote.QuoteValue: I find, at times, people underestimate me. That's really an asset

Quote.Author: Lynn Good
Quote.QuoteValue: Always play to your strengths, whether your strengths are gender-based or just natural aptitude

Quote.Author: Lynn Good
Quote.QuoteValue: There is growing demand for renewable energy

Quote.Author: Lynn Good
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think of myself as a powerful woman

Quote.Author: Lynn Good
Quote.QuoteValue: We are accountable for what happened at Dan River and have learned from this event

Quote.Author: Lynn Good
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't believe carbon capture is a proven, scalable, commercially available technology

Quote.Author: Lynn Good
Quote.QuoteValue: If you keep an open mind, you can learn so much from the people around you

Quote.Author: Lynn Good
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can, anticipate that life is going to be full of detours

Quote.Author: Lynn Good
Quote.QuoteValue: Utilities fall in love with their assets, and that's a danger we need to avoid

Quote.Author: Lynsey Addario
Quote.QuoteValue: Where in the world would I rather be than on the front line of history?

Quote.Author: Lynsey Addario
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes when I am photographing a major news event, I am suddenly overwhelmed by helplessness

Quote.Author: Lynsey Addario
Quote.QuoteValue: With photography, I always think that it's not good enough

Quote.Author: Lynsey Addario
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's important to have perspective and to look at what you don't necessarily want to see

Quote.Author: Lynsey Addario
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that more often than not, people underestimate me

Quote.Author: Lynsey Addario
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very open person, very self-deprecating. I accept my flaws

Quote.Author: Lynsey Addario
Quote.QuoteValue: Americans are really lovely people - friendly, kind and willing to help you out

Quote.Author: Lynsey Addario
Quote.QuoteValue: Every story takes its toll on me and leaves an impression on me

Quote.Author: Lynsey Addario
Quote.QuoteValue: I would never think of myself as a role model

Quote.Author: Lynsey Addario
Quote.QuoteValue: I got rejected from journalism school!

Quote.Author: Macklemore
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Vote Love' means vote equality. It means vote change. It means vote what's right for humanity

Quote.Author: Macklemore
Quote.QuoteValue: Do you want to live life, or do you want to escape life?

Quote.Author: Macklemore
Quote.QuoteValue: Sampling is kind of prehistoric, given the technology and the textures you can create

Quote.Author: Macklemore
Quote.QuoteValue: Bullying is a national epidemic

Quote.Author: Macklemore
Quote.QuoteValue: My partner has to have good sized bones

Quote.Author: Macklemore
Quote.QuoteValue: I shop at thrift shops probably five times a week

Quote.Author: Macklemore
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to give the people 100% of myself as an artist

Quote.Author: Macklemore
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm as honest as I can be

Quote.Author: Macklemore
Quote.QuoteValue: I think music should be experienced by people all ages

Quote.Author: Macklemore
Quote.QuoteValue: I definitely use 'smiling while rapping' as a tool in the booth. I want to have fun while recording

Quote.Author: Madame de Stael
Quote.QuoteValue: In matters of the heart, nothing is true except the improbable

Quote.Author: Madame de Stael
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the whole history of a woman's life, it is but an episode in a man's

Quote.Author: Madame de Stael
Quote.QuoteValue: One must choose in life between boredom and suffering

Quote.Author: Madame de Stael
Quote.QuoteValue: Politeness is the art of choosing among your thoughts

Quote.Author: Madame de Stael
Quote.QuoteValue: Search for the truth is the noblest occupation of man; its publication is a duty

Quote.Author: Madame de Stael
Quote.QuoteValue: Innocence in genius, and candor in power, are both noble qualities

Quote.Author: Madame de Stael
Quote.QuoteValue: We cease loving ourselves if no one loves us

Quote.Author: Madame de Stael
Quote.QuoteValue: The human mind always makes progress, but it is a progress in spirals

Quote.Author: Madame de Stael
Quote.QuoteValue: The desire of the man is for the woman, but the desire of the woman is for the desire of the man

Quote.Author: Madame de Stael
Quote.QuoteValue: Genius is essentially creative; it bears the stamp of the individual who possesses it

Quote.Author: Maddie Ziegler
Quote.QuoteValue: I dance. I don't really do anything else

Quote.Author: Maddie Ziegler
Quote.QuoteValue: I love snacks, but I'm kind of growing out of them. I'm getting into fruit and Clif Bars

Quote.Author: Maddie Ziegler
Quote.QuoteValue: I never knew that I would be performing on talk shows with Sia

Quote.Author: Maddie Ziegler
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to do something where I can act and dance at the same time, like on Broadway or in movies

Quote.Author: Maddie Ziegler
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to do a reality show when there's so much crying and drama

Quote.Author: Maddie Ziegler
Quote.QuoteValue: I love tap!

Quote.Author: Maddie Ziegler
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's funny when people, they try to imitate the 'Chandelier' video. I think it's hilarious

Quote.Author: Maddie Ziegler
Quote.QuoteValue: I like Disney Channel a lot, and I also like to watch 'Full House.'

Quote.Author: Maddie Ziegler
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to stay professional

Quote.Author: Maddie Ziegler
Quote.QuoteValue: I particularly want more acting. I've been auditioning a lot, and I definitely want to act

Quote.Author: Madeleine Albright
Quote.QuoteValue: To understand Europe, you have to be a genius - or French

Quote.Author: Madeleine Albright
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing I have to go by is what my mother and father told me, how I was brought up

Quote.Author: Madeleine Albright
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't go out with a Republican

Quote.Author: Madeleine Albright
Quote.QuoteValue: People are finding it harder and harder to relate to foreign policy

Quote.Author: Madeleine Albright
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is grim, and we don't have to be grim all the time

Quote.Author: Madeleine Albright
Quote.QuoteValue: I have had fun being who I became, so to speak

Quote.Author: Madeleine Albright
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody's ever said that pins are a tool of diplomacy

Quote.Author: Madeleine Albright
Quote.QuoteValue: Hate, emotionalism, and frustration are not policies

Quote.Author: Madeleine Albright
Quote.QuoteValue: It's one thing to be religious, but it's another thing to make religion your policy

Quote.Author: Madeleine Albright
Quote.QuoteValue: I loved being Secretary of State, that's probably evident to everyone who watched me

Quote.Author: Madonna Ciccone
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the result of the good choices I've made and the bad choices

Quote.Author: Madonna Ciccone
Quote.QuoteValue: I stand for freedom of expression, doing what you believe in, and going after your dreams

Quote.Author: Madonna Ciccone
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm hungry, I eat. When I'm thirsty, I drink. When I feel like saying something, I say it

Quote.Author: Madonna Ciccone
Quote.QuoteValue: I refuse to act the way someone expects me to

Quote.Author: Madonna Ciccone
Quote.QuoteValue: I am my own experiment. I am my own work of art

Quote.Author: Madonna Ciccone
Quote.QuoteValue: I think of myself as a performance artist. I hate being called a pop star. I hate that

Quote.Author: Madonna Ciccone
Quote.QuoteValue: Poor is the man whose pleasures depend on the permission of another

Quote.Author: Madonna Ciccone
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be like Gandhi, and Martin Luther King, and John Lennon... but I want to stay alive

Quote.Author: Madonna Ciccone
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing I've learned is that I'm not the owner of my talent; I'm the manager of it

Quote.Author: Madonna Ciccone
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to change. A new lamp, a piece of art, can transform a room

Quote.Author: Mae West
Quote.QuoteValue: Save a boyfriend for a rainy day - and another, in case it doesn't rain

Quote.Author: Mae West
Quote.QuoteValue: An ounce of performance is worth pounds of promises

Quote.Author: Mae West
Quote.QuoteValue: Sex is emotion in motion

Quote.Author: Mae West
Quote.QuoteValue: Ten men waiting for me at the door? Send one of them home, I'm tired

Quote.Author: Mae West
Quote.QuoteValue: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough

Quote.Author: Mae West
Quote.QuoteValue: If I asked for a cup of coffee, someone would search for the double meaning

Quote.Author: Mae West
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll try anything once, twice if I like it, three times to make sure

Quote.Author: Mae West
Quote.QuoteValue: I never worry about diets. The only carrots that interest me are the number you get in a diamond

Quote.Author: Mae West
Quote.QuoteValue: Personality is the most important thing to an actress's success

Quote.Author: Mae West
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm good, I'm very good. But when I'm bad I'm better

Quote.Author: Magic Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy being the messenger for God in terms of letting people know about HIV and AIDS

Quote.Author: Magic Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: People don't stop eating, and they don't stop drinking coffee

Quote.Author: Magic Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: All kids need is a little help, a little hope and somebody who believes in them

Quote.Author: Magic Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the one who will take chances, not worry about the backlash

Quote.Author: Magic Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: I like things going on in my life. I don't want to be on a beach somewhere just relaxing

Quote.Author: Magic Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't get AIDS from a hug or a handshake or a meal with a friend

Quote.Author: Magic Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Just celebrate the life you had, not the life you could've had

Quote.Author: Magic Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm at peace with myself. The main thing is not letting people dictate what I do or what I am

Quote.Author: Magic Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not cured, but the HIV is asleep deep in my body

Quote.Author: Magic Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, everything is wonderful. Life is wonderful

Quote.Author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness radiates like the fragrance from a flower and draws all good things towards you

Quote.Author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi
Quote.QuoteValue: Just think of any negativity that comes at you as a raindrop falling into the ocean of your bliss

Quote.Author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi
Quote.QuoteValue: Being happy is of the utmost importance. Success in anything is through happiness

Quote.Author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi
Quote.QuoteValue: Life finds its purpose and fulfillment in the expansion of happiness

Quote.Author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi
Quote.QuoteValue: The knowledge from an enlightened person breaks on the hard rocks of ignorance

Quote.Author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi
Quote.QuoteValue: To resolve problems through negotiation is a very childish approach

Quote.Author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi
Quote.QuoteValue: I let people make remarks about me, but it doesn't touch me, all those remarks

Quote.Author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi
Quote.QuoteValue: Monks are not expected to speak about themselves; the message is important, not the person

Quote.Author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi
Quote.QuoteValue: Problems will disappear as darkness disappears with the onset of light

Quote.Author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi
Quote.QuoteValue: The kingdom of heaven is like electricity. You don't see it. It is within you

Quote.Author: Mahershala Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to say goodbye to things in order to take on bigger things that I've always wanted to do

Quote.Author: Mahershala Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: Family are the people that can hurt you the most

Quote.Author: Mahershala Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: I just love what Nicholas Britell did with 'Moonlight.'

Quote.Author: Mahershala Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: Understand that we are all co-creators of our respective destinies

Quote.Author: Mahershala Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: I always hope to be a better person tomorrow than today

Quote.Author: Mahershala Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: The people that I admire have a wonderful balance of self-belief and humility

Quote.Author: Mahershala Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: People do bad things, but that doesn't mean they don't have other colors or qualities

Quote.Author: Mahershala Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Don Cheadle has always done great work

Quote.Author: Mahershala Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: I do believe in the potential of like-minded people coming together

Quote.Author: Mahershala Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Mahershala' is my nickname

Quote.Author: Mahmoud Darwish
Quote.QuoteValue: I never wanted children; maybe I'm afraid of responsibility

Quote.Author: Mahmoud Darwish
Quote.QuoteValue: Without hope we are lost

Quote.Author: Mahmoud Darwish
Quote.QuoteValue: I see poetry as spiritual medicine

Quote.Author: Mahmoud Darwish
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing, nothing justifies terrorism

Quote.Author: Mahmoud Darwish
Quote.QuoteValue: Palestinian people are in love with life

Quote.Author: Mahmoud Darwish
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a lover of Israel, of course. I have no reason to be. But I don't hate Jews

Quote.Author: Mahmoud Darwish
Quote.QuoteValue: History laughs at both the victim and the aggressor

Quote.Author: Mahmoud Darwish
Quote.QuoteValue: To be under occupation, to be under siege, is not a good inspiration for poetry

Quote.Author: Mahmoud Darwish
Quote.QuoteValue: The importance of poetry is not measured, finally, by what the poet says but by how he says it

Quote.Author: Mahmoud Darwish
Quote.QuoteValue: I've built my homeland, I've even founded my state - in my language

Quote.Author: Malala Yousafzai
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world

Quote.Author: Malala Yousafzai
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality

Quote.Author: Malala Yousafzai
Quote.QuoteValue: There should be no discrimination against languages people speak, skin color, or religion

Quote.Author: Malala Yousafzai
Quote.QuoteValue: If you go anywhere, even paradise, you will miss your home

Quote.Author: Malala Yousafzai
Quote.QuoteValue: When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful

Quote.Author: Malala Yousafzai
Quote.QuoteValue: It is very important to know who you are. To make decisions. To show who you are

Quote.Author: Malala Yousafzai
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way to solve problems and to fight against war is through dialogue

Quote.Author: Malala Yousafzai
Quote.QuoteValue: I say I am stronger than fear

Quote.Author: Malala Yousafzai
Quote.QuoteValue: In every country, politics is considered to be a waste of time

Quote.Author: Malala Yousafzai
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I play cricket, and I play badminton

Quote.Author: Malcolm Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: Diversity: the art of thinking independently together

Quote.Author: Malcolm Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: Education's purpose is to replace an empty mind with an open one

Quote.Author: Malcolm Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure is success if we learn from it

Quote.Author: Malcolm Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: Diamonds are nothing more than chunks of coal that stuck to their jobs

Quote.Author: Malcolm Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: Thinking well to be wise: planning well, wiser: doing well wisest and best of all

Quote.Author: Malcolm Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have a job without any aggravations, you don't have a job

Quote.Author: Malcolm Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: Presence is more than just being there

Quote.Author: Malcolm Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: When you cease to dream you cease to live

Quote.Author: Malcolm Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: If you expect nothing, you're apt to be surprised. You'll get it

Quote.Author: Malcolm Forbes
Quote.QuoteValue: It's so much easier to suggest solutions when you don't know too much about the problem

Quote.Author: Malcolm Gladwell
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of what is most beautiful about the world arises from struggle

Quote.Author: Malcolm Gladwell
Quote.QuoteValue: The underdog winning is the romantic position

Quote.Author: Malcolm Gladwell
Quote.QuoteValue: All my books are optimistic!

Quote.Author: Malcolm Gladwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I wrote my first book when I was in my late thirties

Quote.Author: Malcolm Gladwell
Quote.QuoteValue: The visionary starts with a clean sheet of paper, and re-imagines the world

Quote.Author: Malcolm Gladwell
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very hard to find someone who's successful and dislikes what they do

Quote.Author: Malcolm Gladwell
Quote.QuoteValue: People in great institutions are occasionally credulous

Quote.Author: Malcolm Gladwell
Quote.QuoteValue: The injunction to be nice is used to deflect criticism and stifle the legitimate anger of dissent

Quote.Author: Malcolm Gladwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a story-teller, and I look to academic research... for ways of augmenting story-telling

Quote.Author: Malcolm Gladwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Of the great entrepreneurs of this era, people will have forgotten Steve Jobs

Quote.Author: Mao Zedong
Quote.QuoteValue: Communism is not love. Communism is a hammer which we use to crush the enemy

Quote.Author: Mao Zedong
Quote.QuoteValue: In time of difficulties, we must not lose sight of our achievements

Quote.Author: Mao Zedong
Quote.QuoteValue: Political power grows out of the barrel of a gun

Quote.Author: Mao Zedong
Quote.QuoteValue: Women hold up half the sky

Quote.Author: Mao Zedong
Quote.QuoteValue: Let a hundred flowers bloom, let a hundred schools of thought contend

Quote.Author: Mao Zedong
Quote.QuoteValue: An army without culture is a dull-witted army, and a dull-witted army cannot defeat the enemy

Quote.Author: Mao Zedong
Quote.QuoteValue: To read too many books is harmful

Quote.Author: Mao Zedong
Quote.QuoteValue: We shall heal our wounds, collect our dead and continue fighting

Quote.Author: Mao Zedong
Quote.QuoteValue: Swollen in head, weak in legs, sharp in tongue but empty in belly

Quote.Author: Mao Zedong
Quote.QuoteValue: People like me sound like a lot of big cannons

Quote.Author: Marc Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: If you do what you love, you'll never work a day in your life

Quote.Author: Marc Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: Fame is addictive. Money is addictive. Attention is addictive. But golf is second to none

Quote.Author: Marc Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: My thing is music, period

Quote.Author: Marc Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: My mum always told me 95 per cent of success was partnering well

Quote.Author: Marc Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to sing, I want to work on my music, I want to make my movies, that's all I want to do

Quote.Author: Marc Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: Celebrity watching and speculation is almost like a sport

Quote.Author: Marc Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: I say it every day - I'm the luckiest man on earth

Quote.Author: Marc Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Livin' la Vida Loca' is not Latin music. It does not represent Latin music

Quote.Author: Marc Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a huge sports fan

Quote.Author: Marc Anthony
Quote.QuoteValue: What Jennifer Lopez puts out, it's not Latin music

Quote.Author: Marc Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, beauty and makeup and color is like the finishing touch on everything

Quote.Author: Marc Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: I always find beauty in things that are odd and imperfect - they are much more interesting

Quote.Author: Marc Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: My opinion about myself is so based on what other people think of me

Quote.Author: Marc Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: Grunge is a hippied romantic version of punk

Quote.Author: Marc Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: Any opportunity to adorn oneself is human, and accessories are an easy way to do it
